message: Afterward, feeling relaxed, I turn on the TV to see if I can find any news on Toue.
But the channels are full of the usual bullshit.

name: 蒼葉
message: "There's nothing on."

name: クリア
message: "Yeah..."
Just as I'm about to turn off the TV, I hear a strange tune, part of a program praising the virtues of Platinum Jail.
Suddenly, the room is spinning around me.
I cling to the back of the couch to support myself.

name: クリア
message: "Master! Are you alright?! What's wrong?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...M-My head...!"
It feels like it's gonna explode...!
A wave of nausea hits me. I'm seeing double, triple. I can't keep my eyes open.

name: クリア
message: "Ngh! This song...!"
Clear grabs the remote and shuts off the TV.

name: クリア
message: "Are you alright, Master? I think you should rest."
I lie down on the couch with Clear's help, my skin clammy with sweat.
The blood vessels in my head feel like barbed wire, slicing my brain to pieces...

name: クリア
message: "That song... was Dye Music."

name: クリア
message: "It's music that directly affects the brain. Like the name suggests, it 'dyes' your mind."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell..."

name: クリア
message: "Normal humans can't even notice Dye Music. Their minds are dyed without them ever knowing."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh, what does that mean?"

name: クリア
message: "It means that whoever made that song can control your thoughts."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sounds like Toue."

name: クリア
message: "Yes. However, you have a special power, Master. I believe that's why you had a strong reaction to the Dye Music."
I can't believe they're playing something like that on TV...
I'm sure it's not just the music. Toue probably has traps like that set up all over the place.
If normal people can't notice it, all the people in Platinum Jail might already be under Toue's control.
Still...
Something else is bugging me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Why do you know so much about it?"

name: クリア
message: "Well, um..."
Clear hesitates.

name: クリア
message: "...That's a very good question. I'm not entirely sure myself. It just came out of my mouth."

name: クリア
message: "Maybe Grandpa told me."
I don't get the sense that Clear is lying. Now I have to wonder who Clear's grandpa really was...
Before I can ask, though, fresh pain interrupts my thoughts.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Owowow, shit, it still hurts."

name: クリア
message: "The music works on your sense of hearing, so its effects might linger for a bit."

name: クリア
message: "I'll do what I can to make you feel better, Master. Please close your eyes and try to relax."
I close my eyes, take a deep breath, and relax my body.
And then, I hear the gentle sound of Clear's voice.
He's singing, a sweet and gentle melody, like a lullaby to calm a child.
My headache fades as I listen.
I feel myself drifting...
Clear's voice is so pretty...
That's the last thought that enters my mind before I fall asleep.
